post.title: fs - ***unlocked t-mobile bb 9700 *** - works with rogers/fido or wind mobile (pics)
post.content: i am selling a mint t-mobile branded 9700 which is unlocked. works perfect on rogers/fido in edge or on the new wind mobile network. working pin. the phone was purchased by mistake in a deal and is not compatible with bell's hspa network. comes with the home adapter only. no box. asking $425.00 obo pm if interested.
